channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google launches extensions system for its command-line coding tool
item.description: Google launched a new feature for its command-line AI system, Gemini CLI, allowing outside companies to integrate directly into the product.

item.title: SoftBank bulks up its robotics portfolio with ABB Group’s robotics unit
item.description: SoftBank says this acquisition will help it dive deeper into robotics as it considers physical AI to be the next frontier.

item.title: The Moto G Power 5G Is Down to Just $200 Right Now
item.description: The Moto G Power 5G 2025 is a capable budget smartphone, and this deal is too good to pass up.

item.title: The Best Discounts We've Found From the Walmart Deals Sale (2025)
item.description: The Walmart Deals sale is full of discounts on WIRED-approved soundbars, TVs, and more.

item.title: Squishmallows, Lego, and Other Toys Are 50% off Right Now
item.description: Get a head-start on holiday shopping for your kids (or yourself) thanks to these discounted toys.

item.title: We Found the 276 Best Prime Day Deals of 2025: Up To 55% Off
item.description: Amazon's fall 2025 Prime Day sale has great deals on WIRED-tested favorites like Kindles, laptops, Apple Watches, robot vacs, and more.

item.title: Google’s virtual try-on shopping tool expands to more countries, now lets you try on shoes
item.description: To virtually try on a pair of shoes, users need to tap on any product listing on Google, select the "try it on" button and then add a full length phot...

item.title: From courtside to code: Tristan Thompson on AI, sports, and startups at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: NBA champion Tristan Thompson joins TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 to discuss how AI and athletes are transforming sports, startups, and innovation. Register...

item.title: Unveiling the next wave of Startup Battlefield 200 VC judges at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: 5 more VC leaders from Accel, 776, Lockstep, IVP, and more join the Startup Battlefield 200 judge panel at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025. Register now to jo...

item.title: TAG Heuer's New Smartwatch Ditches Google's Wear OS to Be Apple Friendly
item.description: The Connected Calibre E5 runs a bespoke OS. It still works with Android—but it now gets that coveted Made-for-Apple certification.
